resources.string: Do you think your town/neighborhood has enough and in good condition places for child entertainment?
What is your opinion about the traffic situation in your town/neighborhood?
Do you think your town/neighborhood has enough green spaces and that they are in good condition?
Do you think your town/neighborhood has enough variety of stores for the daily shopping and that they offer a good quality-price ratio?
Do you think your town/neighborhood is usually clean?
How would you rate in general the noise level in your town/neighbourhood?
Are there cinemas in a good condition in your town/neighborghood?
Do you think your town/neighborhood presents a good restaurant offer?
Do you think your town/neighborhood presents a good bar/cafeteria offer?
Do you think your town/neighborhood presents a good night club/pub offer?
Are there proper and in good condition shopping malls in your town/neighborhood?
Do you think the offer in cultural activities in your town/neighborhood is good?
Are there enough free places to park or economic parking lots in your town/neighbourhood?
Does your town/neighborhood offer enough, diverse and in good condition health care facilities?
Do you think the police presence in your town/neighborhood is enough and that the police in your town/neighborhood meets expectations?
Do you think your town/neighborhood offers enough education facilities and that these are in good condition and economic?
Do you think your town/neighborhood is well connected and it offers a public transport of quality?
Does your town/neighborhood offer libraries and/or play centers properly equipped and in good condition?
Do you think the drug presence, use or dealing with in your town/neighborhood is worrying?
Do you think thefts are frequent in your town/neighborhood?
Do you think prostitution, in the street and/or in enclosed spaces, is worrying in your neighborhood?
Do you think fighting and/or quarreling is frequent in your town/neighborhood?
Are there other security concerns in your town/neighborhood?
